unnormalised: ## New Wheels on the Road: What's Hot in Automotive Launches!
normalised: ## New Wheels on the Road: What's Hot in Automotive Launches!

unnormalised: Namaste friends! It's your friendly neighborhood petrolhead here, back with the latest scoop on vehicle launches happening right here in Bharat. The automotive scene is buzzing like a Diwali mela, and trust me, you don't want to miss out!
normalised: Namaste friends! It's your friendly neighborhood petrolhead here, back with the latest scoop on vehicle launches happening right here in Bharat. The automotive scene is buzzing like a Diwali mela, and trust me, you don't want to miss out!

unnormalised: First up, let's talk about the buzz around the new Mahindra Thar 5-door. Leaks are flying faster than a speeding rickshaw in Mumbai! Rumours say it's gonna be a beast, even more capable off-road than the current model. Expect a launch sometime Q3 2024. They're really amping up the rugged charm, just like Dr. Kalam envisioned for Indian innovation!
normalised: First up, let's talk about the buzz around the new Mahindra Thar five-door. Leaks are flying faster than a speeding rickshaw in Mumbai! Rumours say it's going to be a beast, even more capable off-road than the current model. Expect a launch sometime Q three two thousand and twenty four. They're really amping up the rugged charm, just like Doctor Kalam envisioned for Indian innovation!

unnormalised: Then there’s Maruti Suzuki. They're reportedly gearing up to launch the next-gen Swift, and sources inside Maruti say its going to blow the competition away. Expect improved fuel efficiency (finally!), and a snazzier interior. Pricing likely to start around Rs. 6 Lakhs. Fingers crossed for a turbo-petrol option!
normalised: Then there’s Maruti Suzuki. They're reportedly gearing up to launch the next-gen Swift, and sources inside Maruti say its going to blow the competition away. Expect improved fuel efficiency (finally!), and a snazzier interior. Pricing likely to start around rupees six lakh. Fingers crossed for a turbo-petrol option!

unnormalised: Electric vehicles are also making waves. Tata Motors is expanding its EV lineup, with whispers of a Nexon EV facelift on the horizon. They're adding a bigger battery pack, promising a range of over 400 km. Perfect for those long drives from Delhi to Jaipur without the range anxiety. Plus, they’re expanding their charging network; new charging stations are popping up faster than chai stalls on a railway platform!
normalised: Electric vehicles are also making waves. Tata Motors is expanding its E V lineup, with whispers of a Nexon E V facelift on the horizon. They're adding a bigger battery pack, promising a range of over four hundred kilometer. Perfect for those long drives from Delhi to Jaipur without the range anxiety. Plus, they’re expanding their charging network; new charging stations are popping up faster than chai stalls on a railway platform!

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Hyundai is teasing us with glimpses of a new SUV – codenamed ‘CL2’. Details are scarce, but whispers suggest a spacious cabin, potentially boasting over 200 sq ft. of room, and packed with features. Expect a grand unveiling at Auto Expo 2025.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Hyundai is teasing us with glimpses of a new S U V – codenamed ‘C L two’. Details are scarce, but whispers suggest a spacious cabin, potentially boasting over two hundred square feet. of room, and packed with features. Expect a grand unveiling at Auto Expo two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: So, there you have it, folks! A quick peek into the upcoming automotive launches. Keep your eyes peeled and your wallets ready! It's going to be an exciting year for car lovers in India. Jai Hind!
normalised: So, there you have it, folks! A quick peek into the upcoming automotive launches. Keep your eyes peeled and your wallets ready! It's going to be an exciting year for car lovers in India. Jai Hind!
